name: Warning Shot
summary: Who needs words when the roar of a gun is so much more succinct?
description: Who needs words when the roar of a gun is so much more succinct? You attempt to Demoralize a foe by firing your weapon into the air, using the firearm's maximum range rather than the usual range of 30 feet. This check doesn't take the â€“4 circumstance penalty if the target doesn't share a language with you.
